definition: to beat/to strike/to hit/to break/to type/to mix up/to build/to fight/to fetch/to make/to tie up/to issue/to shoot/to calculate/to play (a game)/since/from
foot/leg (of an animal or an object)/base (of an object)/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]/classifier for kicks

sentences.english: The children go barefoot in summer.
We won't be able to go there on foot in case it rains.
sentences.chinese: 要是下雨，咱們就不能打赤腳上那兒去。
